one_per_country.description: Optional, limits construction to one per country

allow_in_gold_provinces.description: Optional, whether this building can be built in Gold producing provinces

indestructible.description: Optional, exempts this building from being destroyed via bankruptcy

onmap.description: Optional, whether this building should display a 3D map model

influencing_fort.description: Optional, whether this building operates like a fort

manufactory.description: Optional. Provinces with the listed tradegoods can construct this building.

trigger.description: Optional. Province scope. Limits construction of building if not met.

modifier.description: The modifier the building applies to the province. Country-scope modifiers used here will apply to the owning country of the building instead.

ai_will_do.description: The importance the AI places on constructing this building.

on_built.description: Optional. On action that fires when built. THIS = Province, FROM = Builder (not necessarily owner, can be overlord)

on_destroyed.description: Optional. On action that fires when destroyed. (not obsoleted) THIS = Province, FROM = Destroyer

on_obsolete.description: Optional. On action that fires when obsoleted. (not destroyed) THIS = Province, FROM = Destroyer
